title: Garlic & Vegetable Cheese Bread With Baguette
content:
Breakfast/ Party Starter: Cheesy Garlic & vegetable Bread Servings: 3 Duration: 20 mins This recipe has amazing taste, color, and texture, an instant breakfast/starter with baguette. Baguette is a french bread which is easily available at stores, you can have many options for breakfast with baguette. So today, I am sharing cheesy garlic and vegetable bread with baguette or you can make simple garlic bread ( just skip vegetables in this recipe to make cheesy garlic bread ) I have used onion, green capsicum for toppings you can also include olives, jalapenos, spinach according to your taste, I'm sure all these toppings tastes great with baguette. I hope you will definitely try my new breakfast recipe and check out the video for the full recipe. Let's start with ingredients and follows the procedure Ingredients:
  • Baguette - 1 - store-bought :-)
  • Garlic cloves - 5 - peeled off and finely chopped
  • Red chili flakes - 1 teaspoon
  • Salt - 1/4 tsp
  • Coriander leaves - finely chopped - 2 tbsp
  • Red Onion - 1/2 - sliced
  • Green capsicum/ Bell pepper - 1/2 - sliced
  • Mozzarella cheese - grated - 160 grams
  • Butter ( unsalted ) - 2 tbsp
Procedure:
  • In a bowl, add butter, garlic, coriander leaves, salt, and red chili flakes
  • Mix everything and set aside, then take a baguette and cut into two equal halves (vertically)
  • Arrange side by side on a silicon mat or parchment paper and apply the garlic base on both pieces
  • Next, add few slices of onion and capsicum on each slice of baguette
  • Then, top with mozzarella cheese to make it cheesy garlic veggie baguette :-)
  • Preheat oven at 400 F/ 200 C and bake for 15 mins
  • Take out them carefully from the oven, either chop them into a bite-size or bigger one. Serve with tomato ketchup or you can have it as is :-)
  • Happy cooking and have a lovely day :-)
